Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Forest Avenue business improvement district.
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the extension of the Madison Avenue business improvement district.
Items.MatterName: Extension of the Madison Avenue BID

Items.Title: Resolution concerning the extension of the Madison Avenue Business Improvement District in the Borough of Manhattan and setting the date, time and place for a further public hearing to hear all persons interested in the extension of such district as revised to exclude a property.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Extension of the Madison Avenue BID in the Borough of Manhattan.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Forest Avenue business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made by  that this Introduction be Approved by Committee.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the extension of the Madison Avenue business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
